text:
[Verse]
Neon lights they shine so bright
In the night we take flight
Sidewalks buzz with life and sound
Lost in this electric town

[Verse 2]
Skyscrapers reaching for the sky
Buskers sing as we walk by
Traffic jams and busy streets
Every corner a new beat

[Chorus]
Lost in the city we find our way
Dancing till the break of day
Lost in the city never alone
Feels like this place is our home

[Verse 3]
Cafes packed with coffee dreams
Street art adding color schemes
Subway rides go fast and sure
Urban jungle we endure

[Chorus]
Lost in the city we find our way
Dancing till the break of day
Lost in the city never alone
Feels like this place is our home

[Bridge]
City lights they'll guide us far
Every soul a shining star
In this maze of steel and stone
Together we can't feel alone
title: Lost in the City
